strategy_notes.current_strategy:
Investigated modal HTML structure. Found theorem_thmcontent is an empty

. Lean/reference comment shows in sbs-lean-column but LaTeX statement data not populated.
strategy_notes.observation: This is an upstream Dress pipeline issue. The HTML generation in Runway/Theme.lean or Dress does not embed statement text into the theorem card content div for dep_graph modal nodes.
strategy_notes.recommended_next: Cannot be fixed in CSS/JS convergence loop. Requires Lean code change in Dress to populate theorem_thmcontent with statement data during artifact generation. Should be filed as a separate issue.
